alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 4:04AM PST until December 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow showers will continue with additional accumulations of up to one inch of snow in valleys and 2 to 3 inches in the mountains. * WHERE...White Pine County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
